title: Returning a Faulty Product to a Store

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to return a faulty item to a store. We'll start with how to approach a staff member and explain the problem.

data.tip: The 'scu' sound is like the 'scoo' in 'scoop'. It is a hard 'sk' sound.

content.text: Adjectives in Italian change their ending to match the gender of the noun. Because 'la macchina' is feminine, we use 'rotta'.

content.title: Explaining the Problem
content.setting: You are in an electronics store with your broken coffee machine and you approach a staff member.

conversation_flow.title: Approach the employee and state you have a question about a product
Explain you bought the coffee machine here last week
State that the product is broken

content.text: Great start! Now the employee knows what the problem is. Let's learn how to propose a solution.
`Vorrei` is the polite way to say 'I would like'. It's very useful in shops, cafes, and restaurants.

data.tip: Remember the 'sco' sound, and put the stress on the 'tri' syllable: scon-TREE-no.

content.title: Proposing a Solution
content.setting: The employee is sorry that your machine is broken and is waiting to hear how you'd like to proceed.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm you have the receipt and show it
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oh, mi dispiace. Ha lo scontrino?

conversation_flow.title: Say you would like a new one
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Grazie. Cosa preferisce? Una macchina nuova?

conversation_flow.title: Alternatively, ask for your money back

content.text: Excellent. The employee understands what you want. Let's learn the final phrases to resolve the issue.
`Tutto a posto` is a common phrase to confirm that a situation is resolved or that everything is in order.

data.tip: The 'zie' at the end is one quick sound, like 'tsyeh'. It's not 'gra-zee-ay'.

content.title: Resolving the Issue
content.setting: The employee has checked the policy and returns with a solution for you.

conversation_flow.title: Respond to the employee's solution
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Capisco. Vedo cosa posso fare... Ok, posso dare una macchina del caffè nuova.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm that everything is now sorted out
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfetto. Ecco la macchina nuova. È tutto a posto?

conversation_flow.title: Thank the employee for their help
